UnitDefinition.Name: Non-quantifications handling method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Non-quantifications handling method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: By zero
Unit.Description: Non-quantifications are assumed to be zero's (set to 0).

Unit.Name: By f * LOR
Unit.Description: Non-quantifications are replaced by f * LOR where f is a constant.

Unit.Name: By f * LOD or by LOD + f * (LOQ - LOD)
Unit.ShortName: By f * LOD or by LOD + f * (LOQ - LOD)
Unit.Description: Left censored are replaced by f * LOD; Non-quantifications are replaced by LOD + f * (LOQ - LOD), where f is a constant.
